creator: hkleo@yahoo.com
text:
I try to use WarpConnector and mount the web application to the root of apache.
I can browse the site using http://127.0.0.1/index.jsp . But there are no 
responses when browsing the site using http://127.0.0.1 . I am not sure whether 
it is my configuration problem, or it is a bug.

[Server.xml]
..
<Context path="/test" docBase="test.war" debug="2" reloadable="true"/>
..

[httpd.conf]
..
WebAppConnection Tomcat-Apache      warp  localhost:8008
WebAppDeploy     test.war  Tomcat-Apache  /
..

[My Configuration]
Apache 1.3.19
Tomcat 4.0.1
Sun Jdk 1.3.0_02
MS Windows 2000 SP2

creator: remm@apache.org
text: Webapp is no longer actively developed, so this issue will not be fixed, sorry.
